price: “Gospodaru naš”, reći će, “naši prohtjevi su bili od nas jači, te smo postali narod zalutali.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat ʿalaynā shiq'watunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīna
